Dress comfortably; it's a sit-and-organize gig.How to sign-up:(1) Select the Date and Shift you would to volunteer through the Volunteer Hampton Roads platform.(2) Complete the Requirements:- Individuals aged 16 and older are welcome (16 - 17 years old must have a parent or legal guardian present).- Ensure you complete the REACH Bingo Volunteer Forms using the following links (if you sign-up for multiple events, you only have the complete the requirements once):(1) REACH Bingo Volunteer Form: https://form.jotform.com/231776971754066(2) Video & Photo Release Form: https://form.jotform.com/211795974701161PLEASE NOTE- Both forms must be completed. Once all forms have been completed, you will receive additional information about the event.- Volunteers without completed requirements will be turned away upon arrival.- No volunteers with misdemeanors related to cash or theft, and absolutely NO FELONIES.- Failure to complete requirements may result in removal to accommodate other volunteers.- These requirements are essential for generating volunteer service letters. Without forms, we cannot provide service letters.- If you can no longer participate, please remove yourself to open space for another volunteer.ðŸ’Œ Recognition and Community Service Letters:We require a minimum of SIX (6) combined service hours for service letters. Same-day requests not accepted. Allow 2-3 BUSINESS DAYS for us to prepare your letter.For other inquiries or GROUP (more than 4 people) volunteer opportunities, contact Dr. Jennifer Goff, Executive Director (jgoff@reachreads.org).Join us in this important endeavor to make a lasting impact on literacy in our community. Your dedication matters, and together, we can achieve great things!
data.text:
ðŸ“šðŸŒŸ Join Us in Making a Bigger Impact for Literacy with REACH, Inc.! ðŸŒŸðŸ“š

Where: REACH Office at JANAF Shopping Yard in Norfolk

When: Thursdays, from 11 am to 4 pm

What to expect: Mix, count, and sort pull-tab tickets into bundles. Dress comfortably; it's a sit-and-organize gig.

How to sign-up:

(1) Select the Date and Shift you would to volunteer through the Volunteer Hampton Roads platform.

(2) Complete the Requirements:

- Individuals aged 16 and older are welcome (16 - 17 years old must have a parent or legal guardian present).

- Ensure you complete the REACH Bingo Volunteer Forms using the following links (if you sign-up for multiple events, you only have the complete the requirements once):

(1) REACH Bingo Volunteer Form: https://form.jotform.com/231776971754066

(2) Video & Photo Release Form: https://form.jotform.com/211795974701161

PLEASE NOTE

- Both forms must be completed. Once all forms have been completed, you will receive additional information about the event.
